name: Ethiopian Yirgacheffe
details: Light roast with notes of lemon and jasmine. Grown in Sidama, Ethiopia.

name: Colombian Supremo
details: Medium roast with balanced acidity. Sourced from Huila, Colombia.

name: Dark Italian Espresso
details: Dark roast blend with cocoa and toasted almond notes. Ideal for espresso machines.

name: Sumatra Mandheling
details: Semi-washed process with low acidity. Grown in North Sumatra, Indonesia.

name: Hawaiian Kona Blend
details: Premium medium roast with hints of brown sugar and macadamia nut.

name: Decaf Swiss Water
details: Chemical-free decaffeination process. Medium roast with no bitterness.

name: Cold Brew Blend
details: Coarse-ground blend optimized for 12-hour cold steeping.

name: Vanilla Hazelnut Flavored
details: Medium roast with natural vanilla and hazelnut flavoring.
